entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 6 - Blazor Server Side: RemoteJSDataStream NullReferenceException BUG #38854
  • Custom Request-Id for client side requests #38850
  • [Perf] Plaintext regression compared to 6.0 #38848
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #38847
  • Instruction pointer stays in commented out code after hot reload #38846
  • Blazor SDK Targets Packaging Fixes #38844
    7.0-preview1
  • FileUpload: Did not receive any data in the allotted time. #38842
  • Dynamic sub-app path for a multi-tenant Blazor Server app #38841
  • dotnet watch run not work properly (net core 6) #38845

Closed

  • In Blazor, load a page inside a page #38849
  • Nullable=Enabled results in required validation errors for parameters or bound properties with default values #18403
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Bug with controller action which has a parameter named "index" and an IEnumerable parameter #28603
    Backlog
  • Blazor WASM application Hangs on MSAL Authentication #38653
  • Blazor: Refreshing page throws error when using JavaScript modules #38822
  • Unmarshalled calls with arrays is much slower with WASM 6.0.0 #38510
  • Virtualize: Accessibility (scrolling by keyboard) is broken when using ItemsProvider #38020
    7.0-preview1
  • Document Blazor Virtualize component internal details and the behaviors it results in #29123
    7.0-preview1
  • Razor `@for` statement causes unexpected behavior when loop variable affects a `ChildContent` parameter #38836

PullRequests

Created

  • Using DictionaryKeyPolicy during ProblemDetails.Errors conversion to JSON #38853
  • StatusCodes doc: Mention GetReasonPhrase in remarks #38852
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Support overriding AuthorizeFilter.OnAuthorizationAsync(context) in more cases #38851
    area-mvc
  • StringOutputFormatter doc: explain how it works #38843
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • PageResult doc: Describe ExecuteResultAsync #38840
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Avoiding Inferred required attribute when default value is defined #38801
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Bump .NET SDK again #38506
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e2f3978` to `d61d4d8` #38838
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • ContentResult doc: add links to properties #38828
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • HTTP/3: QPACK decoder performance #38826
    area-runtime
  • LdapAdapter: Keep track of already processed groups to account for circular references #38817
    area-security, community-contribution
  • HTTP/2: Improve incoming header performance #38834
    area-runtime
  • Upgrade Playwright #38414
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Add support for GitHub Codespaces prebuilds #38793
    area-infrastructure
